entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm near the Rockies. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 March 2023
